translation.tagalog: Hello?
translation.english: Hello?

translation.tagalog: Hello po, good morning ma'am. Naririnig niyo po ako ma'am.
translation.english: Hello, good morning ma'am. Can you hear me, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Yes, I will put it up.
translation.english: Yes, I will put it up.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, si Giovanni Angana po ito from CreditMax.
translation.english: Ma'am, this is Giovanni Angana from CreditMax.

translation.tagalog: Oh, no.
translation.english: Oh, no.

translation.tagalog: And I'm calling po in behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. So regarding lang po ito sa tawag ko sa Maya Bank po ni Neslin, kayo na po ito ma'am, kausap ko.
translation.english: And I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. So this is regarding my call about Maya Bank for Neslin, is this you I'm speaking with, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: So, nasa meeting po.
translation.english: She's in a meeting.

translation.tagalog: Ano po, sorry.
translation.english: What was that, sorry?

translation.tagalog: So, nasa meeting po.
translation.english: She's in a meeting.

translation.tagalog: Ano po, sorry. Nasa meeting po. Okay ma'am. So ma'am, regarding po ito sa Maya Bank po ni ma'am Neslin Grace,
translation.english: What was that, sorry. She's in a meeting. Okay ma'am. So ma'am, this is regarding Neslin Grace's Maya Bank.

translation.tagalog: Yes po. So, nasa meeting po.
translation.english: Yes. She's in a meeting.

translation.tagalog: tumawag po dito yung isang kasamahan ko kahapon. And hindi rin po siya yung isang kasakot. So naisabihan po ba ninyo siya ma'am na may tumawag dito regarding sa Maya niya?
translation.english: One of my colleagues called here yesterday. And she also didn't answer. So did you inform her, ma'am, that someone called about her Maya?

translation.tagalog: Yes po.
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Ano po naging response niya ma'am?
translation.english: What was her response, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Okay daw po. Kasi sobrang busy niya po ngayon. Sorry po.
translation.english: She said okay. She's just really busy right now. Sorry.

translation.tagalog: Sobrang busy niya po.
translation.english: She's really busy.

translation.tagalog: Sobrang busy niya po today.
translation.english: She's really busy today.

translation.tagalog: Ano po today?
translation.english: Busy today?

translation.tagalog: Sobrang busy niya po ngayon. Kasi marami po mga meeting po.
translation.english: She's really busy now. She has a lot of meetings.

translation.tagalog: Oh okay. Ma'am, tanong ko na lang po.
translation.english: Oh okay. Ma'am, let me ask.

translation.tagalog: Ayan.
translation.english: There.

translation.tagalog: Tanong ko na lang po. Itong number na tinatawagan ko, number po ba ninyo or number niya?
translation.english: Let me just ask. The number I called, is that yours or hers?

translation.tagalog: Number niya po. Kasi bawal po siyang.
translation.english: It's her number. Because she's not allowed to...

translation.tagalog: So how come po na palagi po niyang iniwan yung cellphone po?
translation.english: So how come she always leaves her cellphone?

translation.tagalog: Hindi po.
translation.english: No.

translation.tagalog: Hello. Hello.
translation.english: Hello. Hello.

translation.tagalog: Kapag may meeting po kasi bawal po. Kasi salpong dun sa meeting po. Kasi masyadong confidential po yung mga pinag-uusapan.
translation.english: When there's a meeting, it's not allowed. Because inside the meeting it's too confidential.

translation.tagalog: Hmm. Mga ilang oras naman inaabot yung meeting nila ma'am?
translation.english: Hmm. How many hours do their meetings usually last, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Depende po sir.
translation.english: It depends, sir.

translation.tagalog: Depende. So mga ano po ma'am, yung mga lagi pong mga oras po, mga lagi pong mga estimated hours po kung sa mga anong oras natatapos po, umabot po ba ng isang araw yung meeting nila? I think so.
translation.english: Depends. So typically ma'am, what's the estimated time they finish, do the meetings last the whole day? I think so.

translation.tagalog: Yes po. Kasi marami mga branches po na mag-o-open.
translation.english: Yes. Because many branches are opening.

translation.tagalog: So whole day po yung meeting nila ma'am?
translation.english: So their meetings last the whole day, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: kaya marami po siyang. Yes po. Isang gabi na po talaga siya nakaka-uwi.
translation.english: That's why... Yes. She really gets home late.

translation.tagalog: And wala siyang phone na dala sa office nila?
translation.english: And she doesn't bring a phone to the office?

translation.english: She doesn’t bring it. This is her phone. She just leaves it.

translation.tagalog: Akaano-ano po ba natin si ma'am Neslin po ma'am?
translation.english: What’s your relation to Ms. Neslin, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Kasi wo wawal nga po yung phone. May500 hand can not handle it. But the illiteracy and I am afraid we have to stick it with the
translation.english: Because her phone’s not available... I’m afraid we have to stick with...

translation.tagalog: Ah okay. Alright. So okay po. So sige po ma'am. So tatawag na lang po ulit ako siguro mamaya-maya, mayang hapon po siguro for follow-ups and updates.
translation.english: Ah okay. Alright. So okay ma'am. I’ll just call again maybe later this afternoon for follow-up and updates.

translation.tagalog: Sur Ovado.
translation.english: Sure, go ahead.

translation.tagalog: Pa-inform na lang din po kay ma'am Neslin po regarding dito sa Maya Bank niya po.
translation.english: Please also inform Ms. Neslin regarding her Maya Bank.

translation.english: She needs to act... (incomprehensible)

translation.tagalog: Kasi we need also, we need din po ng coordination po galing sa kanya mismo.
translation.english: Because we also need her coordination.

translation.tagalog: Oh yeah.
translation.english: Oh yeah.

translation.tagalog: Kasi sa sobrang busy po niya, nakakalimutan niya rin po yung may Maya Bank pong update. Okay po.
translation.english: Because she’s so busy, she forgets there’s an update from Maya Bank. Okay.

translation.tagalog: nakakalimutan niya nga rin po may bahay siya.
translation.english: She even forgets she has a home.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. So sige po. So sana po ay mabigyan niya po ng konting oras. So ito po yung two minutes lang naman po yung hinihingi, hinihingi namin sa kanya ma'am. Regarding po dito, ma-update lang namin sa kanya. Matawagan na namin siya at makausap po. Kahit two minutes lang po.
translation.english: Okay. Hopefully she can give a little time. We're only asking for two minutes, ma'am. Just to update her, talk to her even for two minutes.

translation.tagalog: Hindi na nga kumakainin po niya.
translation.english: She doesn’t even eat anymore.

translation.tagalog: Ano po?
translation.english: What?

translation.tagalog: Hindi na nga kumakain minsan.
translation.english: Sometimes she doesn’t even eat.

translation.tagalog: Hindi na po kumakain ma'am?
translation.english: She doesn’t eat, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Sobrang busy. Opo, sobrang busy niya po.
translation.english: Too busy. Yes, she’s really too busy.

translation.tagalog: Okay ganun. Kawawa naman po pala si ma'am. So regarding dyan, possible po na magkasakit po siya sa ganyan ma'am kung sakali pong hindi na siya kumakain.
translation.english: That’s bad. She might get sick from that, ma'am, if she’s not eating.

translation.tagalog: Sabihan ko po.
translation.english: I'll tell her.

translation.tagalog: Sige ma'am. Maraming salamat po. Okay po.
translation.english: Alright ma'am. Thank you very much. Okay.

translation.tagalog: Okay.
